text:
For the second time (first time IRL!), I'll be attending HubSpot Inbound  as an official correspondent for the HubSpot community!

My goal is to meet, speak, and interview every RevOps HubSpot user I can over the course of the event. I know that things will get hectic once the event starts, so I'd love to get some folks scheduled on the calendar before hand.

If you or someone in your org be at INBOUND and have 20-30 min to chat, hit me up!

LFG!
